ygData.subject: If your gonna search OOT or Eurids crossing...
ygData.msgSnippet: Better be invis, and an enduring breathe spell couldn t hurt, I would also recommend banking all your items so you don t have to do any kind of corpse
ygData.messageBody:
Better be invis, and an enduring breathe spell couldn't hurt, I would also
recommend banking all your items so you don't have to do any kind of corpse
recovery.

There are killer sharks out in those waters that con red to me at level 25,
and I hear they are VERY deadly to confront.

I also have a database of failed collapsable pole recipies online, you can
view the page, and also download an Excel version of the list.

http://lockjaw.hamptoncity.com/recipe.html


Rotgut
